title: Chris Wood Brings 'Containment' to New York Comic Con 2015
text: Chris Wood Brings 'Containment' to New York Comic Con 2015 Monday, 12 October 2015 (11 minutes ago) Chris Wood is hot in white as he promotes his upcoming show Containment at 2015 New York Comic Con at The Jacob K. Javits Convention Center on Saturday (October 10) in New York City . The 27-year-old actor was joined by his co-stars Hanna Mangan Lawrence, David Gyasi, and Claudia Black, in addition to executive producer [...] Fox Mulder is more than ready to dive back into the X-Files.
